entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
